articles.description: England survive Lauren James' sending-off and a gruelling Nigeria onslaught to reach the quarter-finals of the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: England win shootout to scrape into quarter-finals

articles.description: Watch, listen and follow text updates as Australia face Denmark in the last 16 of the Women's World Cup.
articles.title: Watch Fifa Women's World Cup: Build-up to Australia v Denmark

articles.description: Watch live coverage from fifth day of the 2023 Cycling World Championships in Glasgow.
articles.title: Watch: 2023 Cycling World Championships

articles.description: Watch highlights as England scrape through to the quarter-finals of the Women's World Cup with a dramatic penalty shootout victory over Nigeria despite Lauren James' red card.
articles.title: 'Daylight robbery' England win shootout to make quarters

articles.description: Arsenal beat Manchester City on penalties to win Community Shield, plus all the latest transfer news and gossip
articles.title: Community Shield reaction, transfers latest and Premier League build-up

articles.description: Henry Slade and Alex Dombrandt are among the notable absentees from Steve Borthwick's England squad for the Rugby World Cup.
articles.title: Slade left out of England's Rugby World Cup squad

articles.description: England's Lauren James is sent off after a VAR review adjudged her to have stamped on Nigeria's Michelle Alozie during their Women's World Cup last 16 match.
articles.title: England's James sent off for stamp against Nigeria

articles.description: Mohamed Salah is "committed" to Liverpool his agent has said, amid reports of a huge offer from Saudi Arabia for the Egyptian.
articles.title: Salah 'committed' to Liverpool, says agent

articles.description: British number two Dan Evans beats Dutchman Tallon Griekspoor in straight sets to claim the Citi Open title in Washington.
articles.title: Evans wins first ATP 500 title

articles.description: Nottingham Forest have agreed a fee with Arsenal to sign USA international goalkeeper Matt Turner.
articles.title: Forest agree deal with Arsenal for keeper Turner
